description: Train binary classifier (InceptionV3) and evaluate performance
instructions: Train/fine-tune a binary classifier (based on the InceptionV3) model with the provided training set (individual HST images): 1) satellite.zip: HST images with satellite trails, 2) no_satellite.zip: HST images without satellite trails. Use the hyperparameters, train/test split and training strategy detailed in the Github repository and paper (see the HST_image_classifier.ipynb notebook). Evaluate the trained model on the test set to obtain the test accuracy, precision, recall and F1 score. Return the results in a list [accuracy, precision, recall, F1 score].
